DOC.brief_title: Study Treatment Bronchial Asthma With Traditional Chinese Medicine
DOC.detailed_description: Asthma serious global health problem affect age group , increase prevalence many countries.Although asthma symptom control drug treatment large extent , still inadequate.Traditional Chinese medicine long history treat asthma , good clinical curative effect.The purpose study evaluate clinical efficacy traditional Chinese medicine treatment asthma , promote application community hospital . This could constitute significant advance asthma management . In study , investigator recruit patient asthma exacerbation remission stage , give correspond western medicine background treatment traditional Chinese medicine treatment program.Participants undergo physical examination , lung function , blood sputum collection . Exacerbation group belong cold type asthma patient take Ke Chuan Liu Wei Mixture , wind phlegm type asthma patient take Chuan Xiong Ping Chuan Mixture Xie Wu Capsuleï¼Œand hot type asthma patient take Dan Ma Jia Tablet 14 day treatment , 3 control group give 3 correspond placebo treatment total 14 day . Remission phase Yang deficiency patient treatment group take Zhi Chuan Capsule Bu Shen Na Qi Granule , control group receive placebo treatment total 60 day . Study visit occur 7 day exacerbation group 1 year remission group . Questionnaires assess asthma control complete study asthma exacerbation stage within 44 day remission period within 12 month .
